msbt.message: You were super busy yesterday! At least, that's the word that's been goin' around, .I love all that energy going to make this place rock even harder, but don't overdo it, OK?
So how many fish did you catch yesterday? Did you snag anything huge, ?Huh? How'd I know? I just heard you ran out with your pole and didn't come back for, like, hours.
Word is you were really going at it with that net yesterday. Way to bug some bugs, !
I heard you picked the beach clean of shells yesterday, .Gotta say, my feet appreciate it. Shells're sharp! Thanks!
I saw you heading to the beach with a shovel yesterday, .I was hoping you were gonna build a sand palace, but someone said you were just digging up clams. Oh well.
I heard a bunch of noises yesterday. I asked around and found out you were poppin' balloons.I gotta say I'm impressed. Those pops just kept coming. That's some seriously good aim, !
I saw you makin' a bunch of wishes on stars last night.What were you wishing so hard for? Is everything alright? Let me know if I can help, .
Were you going around shaking trees yesterday, ?You must know something I don't. The only things trees have ever given me are bits of fruit and lots of bugs.
Heard you were givin' that axe a workout yesterday.So what're you doing with all that wood? You gonna make something cool, ?
I heard you cuttin' trees down yesterday. Actually, we all didAnyway, I'm really digging all the extra space you opened up. Nice work, !
Heard you were planting a whole bunch of stuff yesterday.Nice! Anything we can do to make more beautiful is cool in my book, .
Alright, ! You rock!I just heard about you watering all those flowers. Now THAT was a rock star move, !
Were you doin' an improv show or something yesterday?Everyone was talking about all the funny faces you were making. Wish I could've seen it, .
Just how many flights were you on yesterday? Word is you were jettin' off to everywhere, .Well, did you have fun out there? And more importantly, did you bring me any souvenirs?
Hey, so I knew you were popular, but I don't think I had any idea just HOW popular.I got to meet SO MANY cool, new folks thanks to you. That seriously rocked, !
Word is you got some kind of DIY- wild-hair yesterday. Like, you started making stuff and wouldn't stop.Somake anything rad? C'mon! You knew if you made something that I'd wanna see it, !
Way to break some tools yesterday. No, seriously. Why have 'em if you're not gonna swing 'em, !
Everything alright? I didn't see you much yesterday, so I figured I'd check, .Hey, I get it. Some nights you don't get the sleep you want. Or, if you're me, most nights
Word is you were out explorin' yesterday. Find anything cool?Or maybe you just needed a quiet spot to chill? Yeah, I can respect that, .
Word is you were getting your hands dirty yesterday digging a bunch of pits, .So what's the deal? Are you burying treasure? You setting up a prank? Whatever it is, I want in.
You alright? Heard you kept falling into pits out there, ?Hey! Don't look at me. I didn't dig 'em. This time
What was all that noise coming from your place yesterday, ?It sounded like you had a whole construction operation going in there. Is everything alright?
So, yesterdaymaking a bunch of custom designs, eh? Come up with anything cool, ?
It was awesome talking to you yesterday. We should do it more often, !
What's new with ? I saw you talking to for a while yesterday, .Don't get me wrong, I'm not after juicy gossip or stuff like that. I just wanna look out for my neighbors.
Well, well! If it isn't the talk of , . Bwa ha ha!It was cool of you to check in on everyone yesterday. I know I liked it, and I bet the others did too.
So about yesterday You DO know you can run from wasps, right? They're not THAT fast, .
So! You got stung by a wasp yesterday. You OK, ?When one's chargin' you with its stinger, you don't have to just stand there and take it. You can also run!

I had this weird dream about fossils last night. I guess it had to do with all the digging you did yesterday.So, there was this dinosaur stressing about a mortgage it couldn't pay off in a million years, .Then this OTHER dinosaur came over and started talking about a dream it had about old rocks.It gets hazy after that, but for some reason I think the rest was just two dinosaurs .I don't know. Dreams are weird.
Hey, sothe rock-hitting yesterday. What was up with that? You tryin' to be a drummer, ?
Did you really spend yesterday burying Bells all over the place?I swear there's gotta be better ways of giving back to than that,
Heard you were stocking up on fruit yesterday. You makin' a pie or something, ?Incidentally, if you ARE making pie, I promise I'll try not to steal it from your windowsill while it's cooling
Someone was sayin' you had your head buried in your phone all day yesterday, .I have no idea WHO was sayin' that though 'cause, uhmy head was buried in my phone all day yesterday.
I saw you starin' at your phone yesterday, .If you're gonna be buried in your phone, just be careful how high you set the brightness, OK?
Why didn't you tell me you were gonna do road work yesterday?Alright, I've got two words for you, and I want you to take 'em seriously, . Motorcycle racetrack.
Was that you digging all the new rivers and streams and stuff yesterday, ?Very cool. I'm all for a little extra garden irrigation! My flowers say thanks. Me too, really.
Those new cliffs you built yesterday are seriously rad, .Keep that up and pretty soon we're gonna need to open a sunset-viewing tourism bureau!
I wasn't sure I'd like the fence stuff you did yesterday, butthe new layout's really growin' on me!
Thanks for moving that furniture around yesterday. I was kinda gettin' bored of old layout, .
What was with that nearly creepy ultra-grin you were wearin' yesterday, ?Hmm You WERE starin' at your phone a bunch Did you get a huge batch of Nook Miles?
Rock star ! Way to pay off that loan, !<10_4 /> What? How'd I know?Easy! Everyone's been talking about that huge smile you had walkin' out of Resident Services yesterday!
Heard you spent a bunch of time over at Nook's Cranny yesterday.I get it. I always forget what I came for when I'm in there. Maybe I should start makin' lists,
Was it you who redid the island tune yesterday? I gotta tell you, the new one rocks, !
I can't get enough of the new flag flyin' over Resident Services. You did an awesome job, !
I heard you were waving your transformation wand around a bunch yesterday, .Someone said it was like seeing some kind of tailor-magician conjuring up new outfits.
Word is you were using your vaulting pole a whole bunch yesterday, .Did you used to be, like, some kind of track and field star or something?
Word is you bought a bunch of turnips from Daisy Mae yesterday.Quick pro-tipsell while the selling is good. Don't let 'em rot. Basically, don't be me,
Heard you made a tidy turnip profit yesterday, .You know, if you wanna cover my next mortgage payment, I won't turn it down. Ha! Just kidding. Mostly
Hey, who were you talking to yesterday, ?I promise I'm not trying to be nosy, but I overheard you and curiosity's kinda gettin' the best of me.
I'm no hair expert, but that new style rocks. It's very , .
Something's different about you but, hmm New clothes? New hairstyle? I don't know, .
Word is you were taking a whole lot of photos yesterday. Find any awesome views, ?I wanna get a few good shots to send back to friends and family and stuff, show 'em I'm doing alright out here.
Heard you went all out on diving yesterday. That's rad! I bet you hauled up a whole bunch of stuff!Just be careful swimming out there. You don't wanna push yourself too hard, !
